item.text: After Jesus was born in Bethlehem in Judea, in the time of King Herod, wise men from the East came to Jerusalem

<st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="4226" class="">Where</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the one who</st> is <st data-num="5088" class="">born</st> <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2453" class="">Jews</st>? <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> we <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="792" class="">star</st> when it <st data-num="395" class="">rose</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> have <st data-num="2064">come</st> to <st data-num="4352">worship</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.”

When <st data-num="935" class="">King</st> <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> this he was <st data-num="5015">alarmed</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2414" class="">Jerusalem</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

After <st data-num="4863" class="">assembling</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="749" class="">chief priests</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1122">experts in the law</st>,<n id="1" /> he <st data-num="4441" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="4226" class="">where</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st><n id="2" /> was to be <st data-num="1080">born</st>.
“In Bethlehem of Judea,” they said, “for it is written this way by the prophet:

‘And you, Bethlehem, in the land of Judah,

are in no way least among the rulers of Judah,

for out of you will come a ruler who will shepherd my people Israel.’”
Then Herod privately summoned the wise men and determined from them when the star had appeared.

He<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3992" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="965" class="">Bethlehem</st> and <st data-num="2036" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="4198" class="">Go</st> and <st data-num="1833" class="">look</st> <st data-num="199" class="">carefully</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st>. <st data-num="1875" class="">When</st> you <st data-num="2147" class="">find</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="518" class="">inform</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="3704" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="2504" class="">I</st> can <st data-num="2064" class="">go</st> and <st data-num="4352" class="">worship</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2504" class="">as well</st>.”

After <st data-num="191" class="">listening</st> to <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="935" class="">king</st> they <st data-num="4198" class="">left</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2400" class="">once again</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="792" class="">star</st> they <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> when it <st data-num="395" class="">rose</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4254" class="">led</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="2193" class="">until</st> it <st data-num="2476">stopped</st> <st data-num="1883" class="">above</st> the place <st data-num="3757" class="">where</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st>.

When they <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="792" class="">star</st> they <st data-num="5463" class="">shouted</st> <st data-num="5479">joyfully</st>.<n id="1" />

As they <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3614" class="">house</st> and <st data-num="3708" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3137" class="">Mary</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st>, they <st data-num="4098" class="">bowed down</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="4352" class="">worshiped</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. They <st data-num="455" class="">opened</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="2344" class="">treasure boxes</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4374" class="">gave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1435" class="">gifts</st> of <st data-num="5557" class="">gold</st>, <st data-num="3030" class="">frankincense</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4666" class="">myrrh</st>.<n id="3" />
After being warned in a dream not to return to Herod, they went back by another route to their own country.

After they had gone, an angel of the Lord appeared to Joseph in a dream and said, “Get up, take the child and his mother and flee to Egypt, and stay there until I tell you, for Herod is going to look for the child to kill him.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> he <st data-num="1453">got up</st>, <st data-num="3880" class="">took</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> during<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="402" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="125" class="">Egypt</st>.
He stayed there until Herod died. In this way what was spoken by the Lord through the prophet was fulfilled: “I called my Son out of Egypt.”

When Herod saw that he had been tricked by the wise men, he became enraged. He sent men to kill all the children in Bethlehem and throughout the surrounding region from the age of two and under, according to the time he had learned from the wise men.
Then what was spoken by Jeremiah the prophet was fulfilled:

“A voice was heard in Ramah,

weeping and loud wailing,

Rachel weeping for her children,

and she did not want to be comforted, because they were gone.”
After Herod had died, an angel of the Lord appeared in a dream to Joseph in Egypt

<st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="1453" class="">Get up</st>, <st data-num="3880" class="">take</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4198" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">those who</st> were <st data-num="2212">seeking</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="3813" class="">child’s</st> <st data-num="5590" class="">life</st> <st data-num="2348">are dead</st>.”

<st data-num="1161" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="1453">got up</st> and <st data-num="3880" class="">took</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1525" class="">returned</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">land</st> of <st data-num="2474" class="">Israel</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> when he <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="745" class="">Archelaus</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="936" class="">reigning</st> over <st data-num="2449" class="">Judea</st> <st data-num="473" class="">in place of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="2264" class="">Herod</st>,<n id="2" /> he was <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st> to <st data-num="565" class="">go</st> <st data-num="1563" class="">there</st>. After being <st data-num="5537" class="">warned</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">in</st> a <st data-num="3677" class="">dream</st>, he <st data-num="402" class="">went</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3588">the</st> <st data-num="3313" class="">regions</st> of <st data-num="1056" class="">Galilee</st>.
He came to a town called Nazareth and lived there. Then what had been spoken by the prophets was fulfilled, that Jesus would be called a Nazarene.
